column2: "It's so damn annoying how these little bastards group up like that!"
"By themselves, they're total weaklings, so all you've got to do is take 'em out one by one. It's just, there's always so many of 'em!"
"But I guess smacking down those annoying little things is a good way to blow off some steam, huh?"
"Anyway, I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
